name: Newsfirstflashbriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
News 1st - Sri Lanka's number one mainstream news brand has integrated traditional and new media to emerge as the clear leader. 

Leveraging its strength of over 1,000 island wide correspondents and a staggering 15,000 volunteer citizen journalists known as 'Ureporters' we deliver the best in verified grass-root news reporting directly from the source when the story breaks. 

Broadcasting over TV, Radio and the Internet we provide the news that matters every day 365 days of the year in all three languages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
